Marsil de Athayde Costa e Silva

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/8806574185903521
  • Última atualização do currículo em 28/04/2019

Marsil A. C. Silva graduated from the Pontifical Catholic University of Parana with a degree in Mechatronics Engineering (Control and Automation) in 2012. In 2014 he earned a Master?s degree in Mechanical and Aeronautical Engineering from Instituto Tecnolgico de Aeronutica in Brazil. He earned his PhD in 2018 at the Faculty of Aerospace Engineering of TU Delft and is currently working for ASML as a Design Engineer. His research interests are on MEMS, control systems, system identification, artificial intelligence and optimization. (Texto informado pelo autor)
